DADOS-GERAIS.NOME-EM-CITACOES-BIBLIOGRAFICAS: CARVALHO, G. A. U.;Carvalho, Gabriel A.U.;URQUIZA CARVALHO, GABRIEL AIRES;URQUIZA-CARVALHO, GABRIEL AIRES;URQUIZA-CARVALHO, G. A.;URQUIZA-CARVALHO, GABRIEL A.;URQUIZA-CARVALHO, GABRIEL;URQUIZA'CARVALHO, GABRIEL A.;DE CARVALHO, GABRIEL AIRES URQUIZA;A. Urquiza-Carvalho, Gabriel

RESUMO-CV.TEXTO-RESUMO-CV-RH: Possui graduao em Farmcia pela Universidade Federal da Paraba (2009), mestrado em Qumica pela Universidade Federal da Paraba (2011) e doutorado em Qumica pela Universidade Federal da Paraba (2017). Tem experincia na rea de Qumica, com nfase em Qumica Terica. Possui experincia no tratamento computacional e simulao de biomacromolculas bem como no desenvolvimento e implementao de formalismos computacionais no tratamento de qumica terica, o essencial de quimioinformtica. Atuou na pesquisa de inibidores enzimticos bem como na investigao de estrutura e densidade eletrnica de protenas. Ao se juntar ao grupo do professor Alfredo M. Simas, no Departamento de Qumica Fundamental da UFPE, atuou na fsico-qumica de compostos de coordenaa, principalmente no desenvolvimento do programa Complex Build v1.0 (https://complexbuild.sparkle.pro.br/), para a criao de estruturas de partida de complexos de Lantanides para serem utilizados por programas de modelagem molecular na obteno de estruturas de mnimos reais.
RESUMO-CV.TEXTO-RESUMO-CV-RH-EN: graduation at Farmcia from Universidade Federal da Paraba (2009), master's at Chemistry from Universidade Federal da Paraba (2011) and doctorate at Chemistry from Universidade Federal da Paraba (2017). Has experience in Chemistry, focusing on Theorical Chemistry

OUTRAS-INFORMACOES-RELEVANTES.OUTRAS-INFORMACOES-RELEVANTES:
Tambm concluiu os mini-cursos Uso de Mtodos Estocsticos em Clculos de Estrutura Eletrnica, com durao de 6h, e Scientific Writing: From Research to Manuscript and Presentation, com durao de 4h, no III Simpsio de Estrutura Eletrnica e Dinmica Molecular, em Braslia, no ano de 2010. Bem como o III Curso de Bioinformtica e Biologia Molecular, com durao de 35h, na UFPB, Joo Pessoa, no ano de 2007.

Ministrou a disciplina ?Estudos Dirigidos em Programao em Python na Gerao de Bancos de Dados para a Parametrizao de
Mtodos Semiempricos? no semestre 2019.2 no Programa de Ps-Graduao do Departamento de Qumica Fundamental da Universidade Federeal de Pernambuco. A carga horria da disciplina de 60 horas-aula.

PARTICIPACAO-EM-PROJETO.NOME-ORGAO: Centro de Cincias Exatas e da Natureza - Campus I

PROJETO-DE-PESQUISA.NOME-DO-PROJETO: Estudo do Efeito de Moduladores de Protenas ABCC1 no Desenvolvimento Embrionrio de Ourios-do-Mar
PROJETO-DE-PESQUISA.DESCRICAO-DO-PROJETO: Iniciao Cientfica. Orientao: Prof. Dr. Luis Fernando Marques dos Santos
PROJETO-DE-PESQUISA.DESCRICAO-DO-PROJETO-INGLES:
Scientific Initiation program project. Advised by Prof. Dr. Luis Fernando Marques dos Santos

ABC proteins are a family of ATP-driven efflux pumps distributed among the most varied tissues in the human body. Traditionally, they are associated with protection of sensitive tissues (such as gonads and brain) through the efflux of harmful compounds. The way these proteins devise what is "harmfull" however, remains an elusive mystery. 

The first characterization of this family was in the Multi-Drug Resistance phenotype, in tumoral cells, where the overexpression of proteins of this family renders tumor cells impervious to drugs used in chemotherapy. Further analysis, however, pointed the expressions of MDR-like proteins in almost every branch of life, suggesting that drug-resistance might not be the main dish. 

In Sea Urchins, particularly, there has been reports of ABC proteins expression and their relationships with their external fertilization reproduction. In this work, we probe Echinometra lucunter embryos for the presence of ABCC1 molecules (formelry called MRP1) and their role in the embryonic development of these animals, because this species remains uncharted in many aspects, including the presence of such proteins. Furthermore, we present Sea Urchin embryos as an easy to handle and reliable model of experimentation for preliminary tests of chemotherpic drugs and ABC proteins modulators.
PROJETO-DE-PESQUISA.NOME-DO-PROJETO-INGLES: Study of the Effects of ABCC1 Protein modulators in the Embryonic Development of Sea Urchins

INTEGRANTES-DO-PROJETO.NOME-PARA-CITACAO: CARVALHO, G. A. U.;Carvalho, Gabriel A.U.;URQUIZA CARVALHO, GABRIEL AIRES;URQUIZA-CARVALHO, GABRIEL AIRES;URQUIZA-CARVALHO, G. A.;URQUIZA-CARVALHO, GABRIEL A.;URQUIZA-CARVALHO, GABRIEL;URQUIZA'CARVALHO, GABRIEL A.;DE CARVALHO, GABRIEL AIRES URQUIZA;A. Urquiza-Carvalho, Gabriel

FINANCIADOR-DO-PROJETO.NOME-INSTITUICAO: Conselho Nacional de Desenvolvimento Cientfico e Tecnolgico

PARTICIPACAO-EM-PROJETO.NOME-ORGAO: Centro de Cincias Exatas e da Natureza - Campus I

PROJETO-DE-PESQUISA.NOME-DO-PROJETO: Estudos de dinmica molecular e tcnicas de MMGBSA na estimativa de energia livre de interao ligante-receptor no projeto de novos frmacos contra Leishmanioses
PROJETO-DE-PESQUISA.DESCRICAO-DO-PROJETO: Dissertao de Mestrado. Orientador: Prof. Dr. Gerd Bruno da Rocha
PROJETO-DE-PESQUISA.DESCRICAO-DO-PROJETO-INGLES:
Master degree dissertation. Advised by Prof. Dr. Gerd Bruno da Rocha

Every year, millions of people get infected and other million decease because of poor Leishmaniasis treatment or prevention programs. The mostly affected population usually dwell in third world countries and can harness very limited economic resources. This fact, combined with the other fact that pharmaceutical industries rely on very expensive drug design projects and thus rely on very wide margins of profit. This cruel reality contributes to keep Leishmaniasis a Neglected Disease.

Thus, one possibility would be to develop a sufficiently robust methodology to sort out non-drug molecules from drug-like ones in a wide and varied series of compounds and spare time and money in the effort on synthesizing and testing each molecule. The technique also need to be relatively fast and cheap. The alternatives that comes to mind is a computational and molecular modelling approach. 

In the process of finding drug-like families of molecules against a definite molecular target, estimation of free energy interaction between the drug and the target is a crucial but expensive step. Recently, however, with the development of MMGBSA techniques, such parameters can be estimated with enough degree of confidence to be a useful tool in the process of drug design. 

This work proposes to explore fragment-generated ligands and techniques of molecular dynamics and MMGBSA in the development of a methodology that is both fast and reliable in the estimation of free energies of interaction between drug candidates and molecular targets, in order to identify promising families of drug prototypes against Leishmaniasis.
PROJETO-DE-PESQUISA.NOME-DO-PROJETO-INGLES: Estudos de dinmica molecular e tcnicas de MMGBSA na estimativa de energia livre de interao ligante-receptor no projeto de novos frmacos contra Leishmanioses

PROJETO-DE-PESQUISA.NOME-DO-PROJETO: Estudos de dinmica molecular de interaes ligante-receptor de novos frmacos para doena de Chagas.
PROJETO-DE-PESQUISA.DESCRICAO-DO-PROJETO: Iniciao Cientfica. Orientao: Prof. Dr. Gerd Bruno da Rocha. De fev/2009 a Julho/2009. Substituindo Luiz Vieira Gomes Segundo
PROJETO-DE-PESQUISA.DESCRICAO-DO-PROJETO-INGLES:
Scientific Initiation program project. Advised by Prof. Dr. Gerd Bruno da Roch from feb/2009 to july/2009 in replacement of Luiz Vieira Gome Segundo.

The scope of the work was to use molecular dynamics techniques to calculate interaction parameters such as induced fit and non-covalent interactions distances for a class of molecules produced by Morita-Bayllis Hillman addition.
PROJETO-DE-PESQUISA.NOME-DO-PROJETO-INGLES: Ligand-receptor studies of Molecular Dynamics of new Drugs against Chagas disease

PROJETO-DE-PESQUISA.NOME-DO-PROJETO: Complex Build v2.0: Um software para a construo de complexos de lantandeos
PROJETO-DE-PESQUISA.DESCRICAO-DO-PROJETO: Este projeto visa atualizar e extender as funcionalidades do Complex Build v1.1, um software especializado na construo de estruturas de partida para a modelagem molecular de compostos de coordenao com total controle estereoqumico para compostso com ligantes mono e/ou bidentados. O software foi criado em 2019 e apresenta uma comunidade internacional ativa.

DADOS-BASICOS-DO-SOFTWARE.TITULO-DO-SOFTWARE-INGLES: The complex build algorithm to set up starting structures of lanthanoid complexes with stereochemical control for molecular modeling

DETALHAMENTO-DO-SOFTWARE.FINALIDADE: Auxiliar no estudo terico de complexos de coordenao de Lantandeos.

INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS.DESCRICAO-INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS: When handling metallic centers of higher coordination numbers, one is commonly deluded with the presumption that any assembled metal complex geometry (including a crystallographic one) is good enough as a starting structure for computational chemistry calculations; all oblivious to the fact that such a structure is nothing short of just one out of several, sometimes dozens, or even thousands of other stereoisomers. Moreover, coordination chirality, so frequently present in complexes of higher coordination numbers, is another often overlooked property, rarely recognized as such. The Complex Build algorithm advanced in this article has been designed with the purpose of generating starting structures for molecular modeling calculations with full stereochemical control, including stereoisomer complete identification and coordination chirality recognition. Besides being in the chosen correct stereochemistry, the ligands are positioned by the Complex Build algorithm in a very unobstructed and unclogged manner, so that their degrees of freedom do not hinder or even choke one another, something that would otherwise tend to lead to negative force constants after further geometry optimizations by more advanced computational model chemistries. The Complex Build algorithm has been conceived for any metallic center, but at present is targeting primarily lanthanoids whose coordination numbers range mostly from 5 to 12 and often lead to a combinatorial explosion of stereoisomers.
INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS.DESCRICAO-INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS-INGLES: The software can be downloaded from the homepage at https://complexbuild.sparkle.pro.br/
